title: Remote Education Problem-Solving Project: Applying PBL in Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and remote education tool usage
context.additional_context: Strengthening secondary science education design competencies in a problem-based learning (PBL) environment utilizing virtual spaces.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world problems in remote education (e.g., high dropout rates) using a PBL approach and propose solutions
Learners can elaborate on remote education design plans based on science curricula by applying the ADDIE or ARCS model
Learners can communicate with team members in a virtual collaborative environment to develop and present creative educational solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
